title: France panorama. [No. 68/40]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Techniques: A new electronic linear motor for railway networks. A revolutionary electronic vehicle. 2. Wings: Within the framework of the General Aviation Salon in Toussus-le-Noble, near Paris, French aviatrix Hrissa Pelissier takes off on a round the world flight on a light single-engine French aircraft - an interview on her life and plane. First flight of the new Dassault light transport “Swallow”. 3. Delving into the past: An archeological mystery in the hills over Nice - the strange “Plateau of Idols”. French archeologists in Egypt.
